description: A Twitter-like microblogging application where users can post short messages (snarks), follow other users, like and reply to snarks, and view a timeline feed.

userStories.title: Project Setup and Database Schema
userStories.description: Initialize the project with React frontend and Express backend. Create SQLite database with tables for users, snarks, likes, follows, and replies. Set up dev scripts in package.json.
acceptanceCriteria: npm install works without errors
Database tables are created on server start
Backend runs on port 3001
Frontend runs on port 3000
npm run dev starts both frontend and backend

userStories.title: User Registration and Login
userStories.description: Implement user registration and login with username, display name, and password. Store hashed passwords. Use JWT tokens for session management. Create login and register pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with username, display name, and password
Users can login with username and password
Passwords are hashed before storage
JWT token is returned on successful login
Invalid credentials show error message
Registration validates unique username

userStories.title: Post a Snark
userStories.description: Logged-in users can compose and post a snark (max 280 characters). The snark shows author, content, and timestamp. A compose form is visible at the top of the timeline.
acceptanceCriteria: Compose form accepts text up to 280 characters
Character counter shows remaining characters
Submit button posts the snark to the backend
New snark appears in the timeline immediately
Empty snarks cannot be submitted

userStories.title: Timeline Feed
userStories.description: Display a timeline feed showing all snarks in reverse chronological order. Each snark card shows the author display name, username, content, and relative timestamp (e.g., '5m ago').
acceptanceCriteria: Timeline shows all snarks newest first
Each snark shows author display name and @username
Each snark shows relative timestamp
Timeline loads on the home page
API endpoint GET /api/snarks returns paginated results

userStories.title: Like a Snark
userStories.description: Users can like and unlike snarks. Each snark shows its like count. The like button toggles between liked and unliked states.
acceptanceCriteria: Like button on each snark card
Clicking like toggles the liked state
Like count updates immediately
Users cannot like the same snark twice
API endpoints POST/DELETE /api/snarks/:id/like work correctly

userStories.title: User Profile Page
userStories.description: Each user has a profile page showing their display name, username, bio, join date, and their snarks. Users can edit their own profile bio.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile page at /profile/:username
Shows display name, @username, bio, and join date
Lists all snarks by that user
Own profile shows edit bio button
Bio can be updated and saved

userStories.title: Follow and Unfollow Users
userStories.description: Users can follow and unfollow other users. Profile page shows follower and following counts. A follow/unfollow button appears on other users profiles.
acceptanceCriteria: Follow button on profile pages of other users
Button toggles between Follow and Unfollow
Follower and following counts displayed on profile
Users cannot follow themselves
API endpoints POST/DELETE /api/users/:id/follow work correctly

userStories.title: Following-Only Timeline
userStories.description: Add a tab on the home page to switch between 'All Snarks' and 'Following' feeds. The Following feed only shows snarks from users the current user follows.
acceptanceCriteria: Two tabs: All Snarks and Following
Following tab only shows snarks from followed users
Tabs switch without page reload
Empty state message when not following anyone
API endpoint GET /api/snarks/following returns filtered results

userStories.title: Reply to Snarks
userStories.description: Users can reply to snarks. Replies appear below the original snark. Each snark shows its reply count. Clicking a snark opens a detail view with all replies.
acceptanceCriteria: Reply button on each snark card
Reply form opens when clicking reply
Reply count displayed on snark card
Snark detail page at /snark/:id shows all replies
Replies are shown in chronological order

userStories.title: Search Users and Snarks
userStories.description: Add a search bar that allows searching for users by username/display name and snarks by content. Results are displayed in separate sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar in the navigation header
Search results page at /search?q=term
Results split into Users and Snarks sections
User results show profile card with follow button
Snark results show full snark cards
Search is case-insensitive
